author: By Jacopo Prisco, CNN
title: How to stop disease spreading on airplanes and ships
description: When air and sea travel revives after the coronavirus crisis, what additional measures can passengers expect to ensure planes and ships minimize the risk of spreading infection?
content:
(CNN) Aviation is fighting for survival. Cruise ships are grounded. As the pandemic grows, the travel industry faces an uncertain future and is scrambling to adapt. 
Those aircraft still flying are now subject to stricter than ever hygiene protocols, but whe… [+8313 chars]
